companyIntro.companyDescription: Rajasthan Stone Exports is a leading manufacturer and exporter of premium natural stones including marble, granite, sandstone, and limestone. With over 20 years of experience in the stone industry, we pride ourselves on delivering high-quality products to clients worldwide. Our state-of-the-art processing facility ensures precision cutting and finishing for all types of stone requirements.

Ceramic World India specializes in importing and distributing premium ceramic tiles from leading manufacturers worldwide. We offer an extensive range of floor tiles, wall tiles, vitrified tiles, and designer mosaic tiles for residential and commercial projects. Our showroom showcases the latest trends in tile design and technology, ensuring our customers have access to cutting-edge products.

Gujarat Granite Hub is a premier exporter of natural granite and engineered stone products. We source the finest granite from quarries across India and process them using advanced machinery to meet international quality standards. Our product range includes granite slabs, tiles, and custom-cut pieces for countertops, flooring, and architectural applications. We also specialize in quartz and engineered stone solutions for modern construction projects.

Marble Art Studio is a boutique design studio specializing in artistic marble work and custom stone installations. Founded by award-winning designer Sneha Reddy, we create bespoke marble pieces for luxury homes, hotels, and commercial spaces. Our expertise includes marble flooring, wall cladding, custom furniture, and decorative art pieces. We work with premium Italian marble, Indian marble, and modern alternatives like terrazzo and resin to bring our clients' visions to life.

products.description: Premium quality Makrana white marble slab, famous for its pure white color and fine grain structure. This is the same marble used in the construction of the Taj Mahal. Perfect for luxury flooring, wall cladding, and countertops. Features minimal veining and exceptional polish retention. Ideal for high-end residential and commercial projects.

Premium Absolute Black granite from South India, known for its deep black color without any patterns or veining. This granite offers exceptional durability and low porosity, making it ideal for kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities, and outdoor applications. Polished finish provides a mirror-like reflection. Resistant to heat, scratches, and stains.

Natural Dholpur beige sandstone with uniform texture and warm earthy tones. This sandstone is highly suitable for exterior cladding, garden pathways, pool decks, and interior flooring. Features excellent slip resistance and weather durability. The beige color complements both traditional and contemporary architecture. Easy to maintain and ages beautifully.

Custom-cut Jaisalmer yellow limestone available in various sizes and finishes. This honey-colored limestone is perfect for heritage restoration projects, luxury villas, and traditional architecture. Known for its warmth and natural beauty. We offer custom sizing, edge profiling, and surface finishes including natural, honed, and bush-hammered. Minimum order quantity applies.

Premium quality black slate tiles with natural riven surface texture. Perfect for rustic and contemporary interiors, outdoor patios, and wet areas. Features excellent anti-slip properties and frost resistance. The natural cleft surface provides unique character to each tile. Suitable for both residential and commercial applications. Low maintenance and highly durable.

High-quality full-body vitrified floor tiles with superior strength and durability. Features nano-polished surface for stain resistance and easy maintenance. Suitable for high-traffic commercial and residential areas. Available in contemporary marble look design with consistent pattern throughout. Water absorption less than 0.5%. Tested for slip resistance and chemical resistance.

Classic subway-style ceramic wall tiles with glossy glazed finish. Perfect for modern kitchens, bathrooms, and feature walls. Available in various colors with beveled edges for a premium look. Easy to clean and maintain. Resistant to moisture and thermal shock. Can be installed in brick bond or herringbone pattern for added visual interest. Suitable for both residential and commercial spaces.

Premium wood-effect porcelain tiles that perfectly mimic natural hardwood flooring. Offers the beauty of wood with the durability and low maintenance of porcelain. Suitable for all areas including wet zones. Features realistic wood grain texture and color variation. Frost-proof and suitable for both indoor and outdoor applications. Available in multiple wood tone options. Rectified edges for minimal grout lines.

Stunning glass mosaic tiles perfect for creating eye-catching feature walls, backsplashes, and decorative accents. Made from recycled glass with vibrant colors that won't fade. Each sheet contains small glass pieces in coordinating colors for a sophisticated look. Easy to install on mesh backing. Resistant to water, stains, and chemicals. Ideal for pool surrounds, spa areas, and luxury bathrooms.

products.productName: Heavy Duty Floor Tiles - Industrial Grade
products.description: Industrial-grade floor tiles designed for heavy-duty commercial and industrial applications. Features exceptional impact resistance and load-bearing capacity. Anti-slip R11 rated surface suitable for wet and oily conditions. Resistant to chemicals, acids, and thermal shock. Ideal for factories, warehouses, garages, and commercial kitchens. Available in neutral colors for professional appearance. Easy to clean and maintain.

Stunning Imperial Red granite with deep red background and black speckles. This premium-grade granite is highly sought after for its rich color and elegant appearance. Perfect for kitchen countertops, vanity tops, and luxury flooring. Features excellent hardness and durability. Polished to a mirror finish that enhances the natural beauty of the stone. Resistant to scratches, heat, and stains.

Exquisite Crystal White quartzite with subtle grey veining that resembles fine marble. This natural stone offers superior hardness compared to marble while maintaining an elegant appearance. Ideal for high-end countertops, wall cladding, and luxury flooring. Features high resistance to heat, scratches, and etching. Available in polished and honed finishes. UV resistant and suitable for both indoor and outdoor applications.

Premium engineered quartz surface with Calacatta marble look. Composed of 93% natural quartz crystals and high-quality resin for exceptional strength and beauty. Non-porous surface resists stains, bacteria, and scratches. Maintenance-free and does not require sealing. Perfect for kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities, and commercial surfaces. Consistent pattern and color throughout. Available in polished finish with elegant veining.

products.productName: CNC Carved Granite Panel - Custom Design
products.description: Custom CNC-carved granite panels for architectural and decorative applications. We can create intricate patterns, logos, lettering, and artistic designs on granite surfaces using advanced CNC technology. Perfect for building facades, feature walls, monuments, and signage. Upload your design or work with our team to create unique patterns. Available in various granite colors. Precision cutting ensures consistent quality and detail.

Beautiful Kashmir White granite featuring white background with grey and burgundy specks. This versatile granite complements both traditional and contemporary designs. Ideal for kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities, and flooring. Known for its consistent pattern and easy maintenance. Highly durable and resistant to daily wear and tear. Available in polished and leathered finishes.

Authentic Italian Statuario marble renowned for its pure white background and dramatic grey veining. This premium marble is considered one of the most prestigious natural stones in the world. Perfect for luxury residential projects, hotel lobbies, and high-end commercial spaces. Each slab is unique with distinctive veining patterns. Suitable for flooring, wall cladding, countertops, and sculptural elements. Requires professional sealing and maintenance.

Custom-made travertine tiles with antique tumbled finish for a rustic Mediterranean look. Available in various sizes and edge treatments. Natural stone with characteristic pitting and veining adds authentic character to any space. Perfect for outdoor patios, pool decks, kitchen backsplashes, and bathroom walls. We offer custom sizing, thickness options, and finish types including tumbled, honed, and brushed. Minimum order quantity applies for custom specifications.

Contemporary terrazzo tiles featuring marble and glass aggregate in cement or epoxy matrix. Our designer collection offers modern interpretations of classic terrazzo with vibrant colors and unique patterns. Perfect for creating statement floors, feature walls, and countertops. Available in large format tiles for minimal grout lines. Durable, low-maintenance, and suitable for high-traffic areas. Each tile is sealed and ready for installation.

Custom decorative concrete panels for architectural applications. We create bespoke concrete elements with integrated colors, textures, and patterns. Perfect for feature walls, facades, and interior design elements. Can incorporate embedded materials, relief patterns, or custom molds. Available in various finishes including polished, exposed aggregate, and board-formed. Ideal for modern minimalist and industrial design aesthetics. Lead time required for custom design and fabrication.

High-quality solid surface resin material for seamless installations. Non-porous acrylic-based material available in wide range of solid colors and patterns. Perfect for countertops, sinks, wall panels, and furniture applications. Can be thermoformed and joined invisibly for custom shapes. Repairable and renewable surface. Resistant to moisture, bacteria, and stains. Ideal for healthcare, hospitality, and residential projects. Easy to fabricate and install.
